short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy to build Easy to use

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By interacting with AI and your own knowledge base, after installing the plugin, you can record knowledge documents on the backend of our official website. Then you can directly converse with the AI in the plugin, and the AI will answer your questions based on the knowledge you have recorded.
